refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Computes the probability distribution function of the Negative Binomial distribution function.
Any scalar input argument is expanded to a matrix of doubles of the same size as the other input arguments.

Consider successive random trials, each having a constant probability P of success. The number of extra trials we perform in order to observe a given number R of successes has a negative binomial distribution.
